attributes.action: begin a system to fine the parents of children who are younger then 11 that are roaming around the street and to investigate into their home environment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is illegal to leave a child home alone without parental guidence, however, there are hardly any consequences for young children roaming dangerously around streets with no supervision. Therefore, this petition is for the awareness and the protection of young children on the streets.
